explanation: [0-0] It is a pixel-style picture with a mirror placed on a green meadow. The mirror has a gray edge on its left side. There is an orange carpet on the meadow. The sky is blue with several white clouds.

[0-3] Firstly, a green-skinned character wearing a light blue shirt and dark blue pants walks to the front of the mirror from the left. An identical character appears in the mirror. The light blue-shirted character raises his right arm towards the mirror, and the mirrored character raises his arm as well. He waves to the mirror.

[3-7] Then, a gray skeleton zombie walks behind the light blue-shirted character. The belly of the mirrored character turns into a gray skeleton. The light blue-shirted character outside the mirror looks down at himself. At this time, a purple character appears in the upper left corner. After the purple character stands still, it turns black. At the same time, the two arms of the mirrored character turn black. The light blue-shirted character looks up and sees his reflection in the mirror, waving his hands and jumping, and the mirrored character jumps as well. Then, the light blue-shirted character, the mirrored character, and the gray skeleton zombie turn their heads to look at the black character and then turn back to the mirror.
